00019 #include <iostream>
00020 
00021 #include <boost/foreach.hpp>
00022 #include <boost/program_options.hpp>
00023 
00024 #include "network.hpp"
00025 #include "network/client/client_base.hpp"
00026 
00036 int main(int argc, char* argv[])
00037 {
00038   namespace po = boost::program_options;
00039   po::options_description desc("Allowed options");
00040   desc.add_options()
00041     ("help,?",                                                       "produce help message")
00042     ("version,v",                                                    "display version")
00043     ("host,h", po::value<std::string>()->default_value("127.0.0.1"), "server hostname")
00044     ("port,p", po::value<std::string>()->default_value("18001"),     "server port");
00045 
00046   po::variables_map vm;
00047   try {
00048     po::store(po::parse_command_line(argc, argv, desc), vm);
00049     po::notify(vm);
00050     
00051     if (vm.count("help")) {
00052       std::cout << desc << std::endl;
00053       return 1;
00054     }
00055     if (vm.count("version")) {
00056       std::cout << SVN_VERSION_STRING << std::endl;
00057       return 1;
00058     }
00059   } catch (const std::exception &e) {
00060     std::cout << e.what() << std::endl;
00061     std::cout << desc << std::endl;
00062     return 1;
00063   }
00064 
00065   LOGGER_INIT("./Log", "server_ls");
00066   try {
00067     // make up ptree config
00068     boost::property_tree::ptree config;
00069     config.put("server.<xmlattr>.host", vm["host"].as<std::string>());
00070     config.put("server.<xmlattr>.port", vm["port"].as<std::string>());
00071 
00072     network::client::client_base c(network::get_io_service(), config);
00073 
00074     const std::set<std::string> streams(c.ls());
00075     BOOST_FOREACH (std::string s, streams) {
00076       std::cout << s << std::endl;
00077     }
00078   } catch (const std::exception &e) {
00079     LOG_ERROR(e.what()); 
00080     std::cerr << e.what() << std::endl;
00081     return 1;
00082   }
00083   return 0;
00084 }
